name: sahar-validation
description: Validation and testing suite for SAHAR TV-Remote communication system

scripts.build:ui:both: npm run build:ui:tv && npm run build:ui:remote
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui:both
scripts.mode:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run run:server
scripts.mode:tv-stub: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui:remote && concurrently -k -n server,tvstub "npm:run:server" "npm:run:stub:tv"
scripts.mode:remote-stub: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui:tv && concurrently -k -n server,remotestub "npm:run:server" "npm:run:stub:remote"

author: Sahar Project
